ai-mil7.5.7:1.1_0: “Venerable Similarly, what are the three factors for one who belongs to?”
ai-mil7.5.7:1.2_0: “The nights in the wilderness, Great King, in the open air,
ai-mil7.5.7:1.3_0: In the same way, great king, one who lives in the wilderness, brings about the day and night in the open.
ai-mil7.5.7:1.4_0: This is the first herd of deer.
ai-mil7.5.7:2.1_0: The Buddha has told him what the goddess of gods that deity opening in Nādika
ai-mil7.5.7:3.1_0: ‘Sāriputta, the nights, in the cold spell when the snow is falling.
ai-mil7.5.7:3.2_0: But in the last month of sumer I’d stay in the open by day and in the forest by night.’
ai-mil7.5.7:4.1_0: Furthermore, a bears a hundred times a thousand coins on a caravan, and not grew down.
ai-mil7.5.7:4.2_0: In the same way, great king, the meditator should presume to live in the defilement of his own defilements.
ai-mil7.5.7:4.3_0: This is the second herd of deer.
ai-mil7.5.7:5.1_0: Furthermore, when they see a human being, the goad saw me they me.
ai-mil7.5.7:5.2_0: In the same way, great king, when you saw those quarrels and disputes in the Saṅgha, arguing with such unethical conduct, you should see me, when they see me.
ai-mil7.5.7:5.3_0: This is the third herd of deer.
ai-mil7.5.7:5.4_0: The senior monk who has heard the statement of the Teacher:
ai-mil7.5.7:6.1_0: ‘May I have nothing to do with those of bad wishes,
ai-mil7.5.7:6.3_0: A uneducated person is uneducated and unpracticed.
ai-mil7.5.7:7.1_0: The seventh enquiry is the seventh section.
